title: Koutetsu no Vendetta Episode 0
synopsis: The doujin (self-published) creators of the Koutetsu no Vendetta (Iron Vendetta) military robot anime project released a preview DVD at Tokyo's Comic Market 75 convention. The DVD included the unedited versions of the project's pilot film, special supplemental videos, and a collection of key animation drawings. The running times of the pilot and the supplemental video collection are each under five minutes long.
staff: [['Tamamura, Jin', ['Producer', ' Director']], ['Motoyama, Satoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Sakimoto, Hitoshi', ['Music']], ['Yoshida, Tooru', ['Mechanical Design']]]
